welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kaohsiung, Taiwan! Get ready to immerse yourself in this vibrant city known for its beautiful temples, bustling night markets, and stunning harbor. Enjoy your time here and explore all that Kaohsiung has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kaoshiung International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Kaoshiung International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pingtung Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
